item.title: Building Os Full Procedure(Click to view full procedure)
item.description: Write Your Own 64-bit Operating System Kernel From Scratch You can find full code on my Git repo https://github.com/awaisshah2280/myFirstOS.git. You can find code of this static site on repo https://github.com/awaisshah2280/mysite.git Prerequisites A text editor such as VS Code. Docker for creating our build-environment. Qemu for emulating our operating system. Remember to add Qemu to the path so that you can access it from your command-line.
